channel.title: Swara: Voice of the Developing World
channel.description: Brought to you by MIT and Microsoft

Report about pollution control board irregularity in environment public hearing in Orissa:This is lipto mills speaking from orissa at rajgunkar the public hearing has been already heard one it happened on 8th and one it happened on 9th on 8th dated public hearing was made that is what it was mentioned 30days back in the newspaper In the newspaper they have written that 78 acres of land is for minning and getting stones this was the hearing which they made on 9th the public hearing there was hearing but no advertisment was given in the newspaper there 30days back people was against stating they have not got the news but the newspaper people tells that the hearing was already made thus the orissa pollution board control is irreqularity out of this we have to learn that if the public hearing happens then what will happen and before some problem persists we should be careful and we should look into it how we can stop every public hearing that we should understand...
Appeal from Chhattisgarh anti liquor campaign

Agitation of Mongra dam affected people getting stronger:This is mornaam bhansa speaking from ambagarh julmul morchas association this is to infrom you that shyamlal from mongra village tells that mongra dam was built in the year of 2005 and the villagers did not get any water facitlity from the dam and we were waiting for a long time but district collector has not taken any action on mongra dam to give us the water and even politician also so we are very angry and irated on them and we are going to protest and we will not allow water to go out from the mongra dam till we get the justice..

Double click to add info about this comment...Hi the sound which your listening is about rally this is philmon toppo here the women marching from high school ground to the office almost 3000 people have participated in this rally to get justice on the school issue..
Irregularities in public hearing for Athena power plant

Prakash Korram of Ekta Parishad released on bail:This is Agnu Ram sahu speaking on behalf of ekta parishad regarding prakash koram who is the associate of ekta parishad Police have blamed him wrongly that he was carring gun in the forest which was against the law and without license but this is false previously i explained you detaily regarding this matter we had gone to district court for the bail on 5th april but we did not get yesterday we have got the bail and prakash koram was released and we ekta parishad has filed the case against the police so whatever false accusation made against prakash koram it is not true..
Growing protest against liquor shops in Raipur
Comment about new land rates under rehabilitation policy

Request message from Concerned Citizens team visiting Bastar:This is kavitha krishnan here iam from Hindustan communist party marxist here one of the concerned citizens problem solving team is reaching to jagdalpur 9th april and dantewada 10th april In that meeting i myself will be there and from baagppa male abijeet majmudar will be there and sandeep singh and jainisim president will be available professor nandini chandra from delhi university will also be available so withe them some other people also will be available and we will be meeting chattisgarh people to solve the issues or problems if any body wants me to contact means you can call me on 9560756628 or 09753074152 and also i will try to contact you through message to reach to your place so that we will be reaching there on 9th jagdalpur and 10th dantewada thank you..
Interview about fight of Kanha affected Baiga tribals in Balaghat
Gondi song by Dashrath Mulethi
Protest Against English Liquor shops : message in Gondi Language..
Comment in Gondi about Right to Education Act
Workshop on NREGA and Forest Rights Act for Baiga tribals in Bilaspur
Comment on situation of Mid day meal scheme in schools

Request from NGO trying to work with displaced Chhattisgarh tribals now living in Andhra:From so many years around thousand tribal people have been migrated from chhattisgarh to andhra pradesh and we christian tribal net organisation have been helping them for their needs we asked what is the reason that you have come here they told we dont have proper house proper food proper clothing we are litterly dying when we heard this we started helping them we request you people to help us my name is M YOGESH SHETTY and my number is 9347691304..

Comment on dismissal of disapperance case from Nendra village in Dantewada:This is hamanshu kumar from dantewada this is regarding the troubles for tribal people police people are torchering like anything like this one incident from nendra village police have taken a father and daughter to the police station and next day they have killed the girls father near harbour camp and girl is not be seen at all so girls younger brother came to me and narrated the incident and he told me to get justice on this incident so i took the boy till high court and boy narrated all the incident to the court and the court gave a different date to give the judgement afterwards police have met the boy and spoke then when the court called the boy the boy told i dont have any enemity on police only thing i want my sister back but court told him no problem you can take time or you can inform us separately regarding the incident but boy was not willing so like this people are tribal people afraid of police..

Comment on police role in dealing with religious conversion:Iam talking from chattisgarh many hindus have been converted as christians by missionaries because of that many goondas or troublemaker come and destroy the houses churches and hit the people it is very bad when they complaint to police they were silent and those people are supporting hindus only and they are not taking any case as per my concern they take both the parties for example hindus and christians makes mistakes means both of them should be punished then only it will be perfect i have seen wherever bjp goverment is there the religious problems starts..
Report on Sarhul festival in Jashpur

Ponds have dried, water situation in Ambagarh area:Hi this is mornaam bhansa julmul morcha from ambagarh area gainsingh brother wants to speak to you regarding water situation under grampanchyat there is three villages called like kursitar reibari malguri these three villages ponds have been dried up there is no water and now most of the people we are facing problem to get the water now we are using well water for timing to take bath which is not good and it is very far also from there we bring water to the house to manage...

Comment on wastage of public money by legislators by going to Kumbh:Hello this is surendra hanspal speaking from raipur dist chattisgarh recently we got the news that in chattisgarh legislative office (vidan sabha) leaders are going haridwar to take kumbh bath BJP people and Cong people also joined on this kumbh bath this gives the clear picture that using goverment money and pressuring people for the money to go and take bath kumbh via flight (aeroplane) and using the money for their own expenditure and freely using the funds this is what most of the chattisgarh people who is around 1.25crores asking the question regarding the spending the peoples money have been misused by the leaders on this kumbh bath every ministers has reached to that place and they have washed there sins in ganga river after taking bath they went to delhi and after going to delhi and they will go to the president office and parliament and meet the senior leaders but now people are telling why congress has to go with bjp to take bath we dont know but people say that bjp want congress people to mingle with them or compromise them that was it bjps intention they think no matter whatever happens ultimately they have misusued the peoples money and they are not rectifying peoples problem only they enjoy by themselves its a selfish attitude...

Protest rally on 13th April against land acquisition for Mines:This is lakanth singh here from ambikapur at jaganathpur mines project these people has accquired around 700acres of land for mining this land includes forest also on 10th dec 2009 this has been accquired but the village people against it and we spoke to the leaders regarding if this has not been stooped on 13 april 2010 we will a rally or protest on this issue.

Pollution due to Sponge iron factory in Bastar:My name is mordaan ghatia near bastar there is a sponge iron factory has been made almost 5years without esp it is been running and because of that near by areas as been becuase of pollution near by area has been affected anything and this has been polluted in water , forest etc and people are getting suffocated and some people are become sick also because of that and no action or investigation has not been made by politicians or leaders and ask the leaders to investigate on this issue and even see the near places regarding this pollution.
Workers in education dept not paid from last one year : Interview
News in Gondi about bridge on Indravati
Dr Ramakant Dani on illegal usage of unused land by Bhilai Steel Plant, 642 and 672 are the same
Message by Agnu Sahu on Prakash Korram with introduction : 665671..
Dr Dani on the role of election commission in India : 669 and 640 are same comments.

Meeting of Mining activists in Ranchi : This is philmon toppo from ranchi At ranchi they have jharkhand mines area committee meeting and many places will be participating like Jharkhand Orissa Chattisgarh etc and whoever died in the mining they will have condonlence for them and they will start the meeting and through the meetings many things will be changed rectified and do lot of developments for the workers not only that sometime back police have killed some 5 mining workers stating that they were naxalites but thye were not naxalites they were workers of the mining we have to remember them also in condoloence and meeting.......

Ekta Parishad activist produced in court after 2 weeks:Yes iam calling from bastar this is agnuram sahu speaking for prakashkoram has been arrested we were asking police people that we want to speak to him over the phone the authorities they told that prakash is not here and not in the custody also so we went to the office of ekta parishads vice president we told him that until you tell the police people release him we will not go from this place itself and we will protest infront of your office Around 3:45pm one of the person called zameer awas told that prakash is safe in jail since the road was blocked and we were not able to take him to court once the road opens we will take him to the court then we told him to open the road which is blocked it is your responsiblity then around 6pm in the evening they brought prakash to court from there they sent him to kankher jail and i met prakash yesterday he told me that from 12th march to 18th march police have bitten him very badly in the jail without any mercy..
Govt selling liquor is unconstitutional
Murder of Madkam Hidmes husband who had complained about being raped: 649 and 658 are same comments..
Adivasi song in Sadri from Jashpur edited

Comment on Right to vote for nobody:My name is Dr. Ramakanth Dani speaking from state election commission committee iam part of it as i felt that many elections has different kind of issues and problems and slowly voting is getting reduced because of that the responsibility for that issue is the leader of the election committee and the elections have been misused by the people but these people work what the chief election commissioner says for example:In 1961 the election control rule was made and ever people have the rights to vote but many people like newspaper companies journalist politicians and many people do know have the idea about this issue Thus iam telling that to take up this issue..

Interview on Caste problem in Maharashtra:Mornam Bhansa from ambagarh now iam in ahmedabad in a programme and with me vidya maitre here from dalit committee she wants to speak to you:This is vidya maitri speaking from maharashtra iam working for caste system caste system is one of the big disease were we have to control very urgently In maharastra still the caste problem is going on earlier people use to tell now the world has changed the caste problem will not be there but in maharastra now also there is a problem on caste system In maharashtra there is specific place called maratha in that place there is lot of caste problem many cases FIR is not written or charged Iam working has a adovcate many cases police people is not taking but we ask them to take it they will not put proper section so till now police have not taken any necessary steps and dalit problem has not yet been solved now it is solved only 0.1percent thank you..

Rally in Raipur to celebrate centenary year of womens day:This is Zulekha Jabin here from sarathy womens association from chattisgarh on 19th and 20th of march they had a rally in raipur organised which is of womens centenary celebration a programme was organised almost 800 people have been participated in this program and all the women spoke about their thoughts today 20th of march all the women are talking about waterlife land and forest protection the village improvments because of this womens were awarded..
Rally against land acquisition in Raigarh
Arrest of Prakash Korram of Ekta Parishad
All India Tribal football touranment in Jashpur

Philmon Toppo interviews a Kudukh speaker on Forest Rights Act from Jashpur:624 and 622 are same comments

Will not give land at any cost : Villagers in Janjgir are protesting that they will not give thier land for power plantation or thermal power plant if they get also they will give us only 13mv power for us and we villagers from chattisgarh we dont want give our land at any cost this is alok shukla from chattisgarh..

Situation of education in Uttarakhand:Hello this is Mornaam Bhansa here from ambaghar cgnet I had been to ahmedabad to Morcha Womens Association and here a person by name Lakshmi She wants to speak few words about uttarakhand she is a teacher Hai this is lakshmi here from uttarakhand in uttarakhand most of the people they doesnt allow their children to go to school because they have climb the hill and come to come to school and in the schools there instead of teacher and children they have kept only sticks and woods and i do not know what will be future of the children their and future of that hill in uttarakhand.
Song by Budhan : Nahee lage Lathi goli
Last rites of Shankar Guha Niyogi

Cricket betting arrests in Raipur:Hello this is surendra hanspal today when the newspapers reached to every people at raipur they were shock to see that in the cricket which is one of the most famous and favourite of india people are betting around lakhs to crores of rupees and they have already arrested the people who were betting and taken them to court they work hard but they spend money via betting and they took them to court but bigger people are still there but there is saying in the sea they can catch the small fish but they cannot get the big fish.
Double click to add info about this comment...News in Adivasi Language..

Double click to add info about this comment...Iam farahudeen from chattisgarh i wanted to talk about Amar Agarwal who is a minister it good to have the wine shops but i feel it is very dangerous for the people who is in chattisgarh and i inform every people of chattisgarh that we should protest on this wine shops..
Double click to add info about this comment...This is udip kumar from farahudeen i would like to sing song on drinks..

Double click to add info about this comment...On 11/03/2010 we had big protest in riapur about closing the wineshops and stop the drinks around 1000 people have been partcipated on this rally and we had gone to politicians on this issue they told they will inform us on 17/03/2010 on this issue if the politicians not calling us means then we will go to every village in chattisgarh will ask them to strongly protest on the drinks and wineshops this gullari diariya from chattisgarh...

Misuse of reservation for women in Panchayat:Hello this mornam bhansa here from julmul morcha womens assoication at ambagarh chownki iam talking now iam ahmedabad here i have a person to speak to panchayat by name sunitha from rajasthan :hello this sunitha here from rajasthan according to railway reservation we women got 50percent concession on reservation seats but here our husbands are misusing Acutally we have won the election but now it is not right that our husbands are using....
Womens Day program in Bastar

Comment by Surendra Hanspal on CGnet Swara:Hello this is Surendra Hanspal from riapur chattisgarh and here i have opened a website on communication system based on mobile phones and it is very useful not only through swara many people can have contacts in the chattisgarh village so that we can be much closer because of swara and iam very happy and congrats on this new mobile project..
Report about Manera rally and song by Malti in Kudukh

Anti liquor rally in Raipur : Hello this Shabam here iam talking from chattisgarh against liquor on 11th march 2010 at raipur by 12:00pm they will start the big rally or protest liquor to stop since we are protesting we would like to inform around 2crores people of chattisgarh has to co-operate and join this rally to stop the liquor.

Troubles due to liquor shops in Bijapur:Hi this kushal here from bijapur and in bijapur village there are many english based wine shops have come every cross and lane it has come and many people are facing lot problems because of that people cannot work on that roads and they sell the wines in a higher rates and people spend their money on that thank you.

Situation of hospital in Bijapur:hello this kushal here from bijapur in our village we have hospital but no doctor or compounder if some one gets hurt means they have to carry them 200kms beyond to the hospital even for the delivery patients it is very difficult on the way only god can help us..

How should be our school : Children speak, part 1:Hello My Name is Adihu and iam from lucknow here some poor children wants to speak how school should 1std kid-we should have good classrooms,bathrooms in that smell should not come big ground and playing items,Hi this mohammed here In our school there should be big ground to play, good bathrooms ,good teachers,good educations,Hello-this is kushal here in our school we should have big ground to play badminton,good bathrooms,good teacher etc...

How should be our school : Children speak part 2:Hello My name is Adihu from lucknow here are some poor children they want to speak regarding schools we should have good classrooms ,good bathrooms,big graden,big ground to play and there should no wastage to be seen in front of our school we need pencil, books,erazer,good uniforms,good shoes and many more......

Beating of studnets in Ambikapur: "In Ambikapur the police have done the latti charge on PG college students. In Sarguja, we have head office in Ambikapur. Police have beaten the students left and right. This incident happened on Feb 15 around 2:12pm. Because of police behaviour the vice president in the college and NSU department are talking on this issue that police should apologise to the students. Since the apology has not been done, the vice president of the college and the assistant professor of the college are talking on this issue. Since the latti charge was happening the police have put the students in the room and beating them left and right. The NSU department spoke that since the police have taken the laws in their hands, it is not right to beat the students. Singdeva and Amarjit from the head office are making a meeting on this issue and trying to rectify about this serious issue. This is Prakash Gupta from CGNet."

Hi, this is Annimanadik from Kunkuri of Jashpur district. I have come here to learn and talk about the human develpment publication of social service for 10 days and I am sure that when we collect all the necessary information of all the problems, we can make a report and publish it and I am sure by 10 days we can make it up so that every local person from Chhattisgarh and Jashpur districts can give information on their issues and this information reaches to all the people. Thank you. Amen.

Shivsena attacks: "On Valentine's day, Shivsena were protesting and not allowing the lovers to participate in Valentines day. In fact, on 14th Feb the police were watching over the protest. Shivsena people made many lovers either to tie the rakhee or call them as brothers and sisters. Lovers on Valentines day, they used to go to parks or give greetings or share SMS through mobile. At one point of time, one of the couples had come to Sanjya Park Sarjuna Nagar. When the couple saw the Shivsena Batalion they ran from there but they were found, so the boy told the Shivsena that the girl is his sister. Once he told them Shivsena made the boy to tie the rakhee on the girls hand. Because of that both of them became shamed. -Prakash"

Got Presidents medal by giving false information: "Sarpanch has given false information and put the dust on officers' faces. The Sarpanch has given false information about cleansing and developing the village, and for that the President has awarded him Rs. 50,000 of cash and gold medal but the village people are telling there are some places where the Sarpanch have not taken any action on this. And in Gram Panchayat one of the leaders by name Paras has told that he cleansed Nirmalpur Village but I don't know about this. I think the part about Nirmalpur Village cleansing is a joke. That is what I feel. This is Vikas Gupta from Bhakatvar. For further information call me on 9320071813."

Philmon reporting on Kunkuri rally: "As you people are seeing there is a rally happening in Kunkuri, by women, and it is a long rally and my name is Telukunto and here some people have come from Delhi. Some research people have come to make this rally success. This was arranged by Chattisgarh Association. For further information you can contact me on 9406385841. Thank you."
Protesters in CG: Whose land is this? "There is no clothing. We need food. The land, forest and other sources belong to us. You people rob, again you people rob from us".
Kudukh song by Neelam Xes
